textBeforeTable: Servings per container 60 Serving size 2 Softgels Supplement Facts Zyflamend Whole Body Product Label: New Chapter Zyflamend delivers powerful cardiovascular and joint support. This unique herbal formula features oregano, ginger, rosemary and turmeric together with extracts including Chinese goldthread and Chinese skullcap. Zyflamend also features green tea and Polygonum cuspidatum, a natural source of resveratrol, which recent studies link to overall health and longevity. textAfterTable: • Daily Value not established Other ingredients: Extra-virgin olive oil, maltodextrin, silica, yellow beeswax and organic sunflower oil. Capsule: Gelatin (Halal), vegetable glycerine, water and carob. Suggested Use: Two softgels daily with food. For best results, take one softgel twice daily with food. Caution: As with any dietary or herbal supplement, you should advise your healthcare practitioner of the use of this product. If you are nursing, pregnant, or considering pregnancy, you should consult your healthcare practitioner prior to using this product. Naturally gluten free. Softgel capsules are prepared without any chemical solvents and are BSE free.
